monster,\""},{"lineNumber":34935,"originalJapaneseLine":"　北方面軍が壊滅状態に陥っているとのことで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"the Northern Front Army has fallen into a state of collapse...\""},{"lineNumber":34936,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ！？　一匹にか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!? By just one!?\""},{"lineNumber":34937,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しょ、正体不明の、巨大な魔物が……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-a huge, unidentified monster...!\""},{"lineNumber":34938,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、いえ、自らを魔王と名乗って……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, it calls itself the Demon King...!\""},{"lineNumber":34939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、しゃきっと喋りやがれ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it, speak clearly!\""},{"lineNumber":34940,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何が出たんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What came out!?\""},{"lineNumber":34941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリス……ケイブリスです！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kaiburis... it’s Kaiburis!\""},{"lineNumber":34942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスが現れて、北方面軍は……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kaiburis appeared, and the Northern Front Army...!\""},{"lineNumber":34943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと、自分で出てきやがったのか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What? It came out itself!?\""},{"lineNumber":34944,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でもランス様、すごーく強いという話ですけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, Lord Rance, I’ve heard it’s incredibly strong,\""},{"lineNumber":34945,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いくらなんでも、こんな……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"surely it can’t be like this... right...?\""},{"lineNumber":34946,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、無敵結界があるからだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. It must be because of the invincible barrier.\""},{"lineNumber":34947,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の居ない間に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"While I was away...\""},{"lineNumber":34948,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ、ランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":34949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうやら、我々は遅すぎたようです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems we were too late.\""},{"lineNumber":34950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クルックー？　どうした」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuluckoo? What’s wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":34951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つい、先程……年号が変わりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just a little while ago... the era changed.\""},{"lineNumber":34952,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今はKL元年に。つまり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It is now the first year of KL. That means...\""},{"lineNumber":34953,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王が……代替わりした…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Demon King... has been succeeded...\""},{"lineNumber":34954,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。ケイブリスは、魔王になったようです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. Kaiburis has apparently become the Demon King.\""},{"lineNumber":34955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ……美樹ちゃんは…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then... what about Miki-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":34956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................!\""},{"lineNumber":34957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人……いえ、魔王ケイブリス、こちらに来ます！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demon... no, Demon King Kaiburis is coming here!\""},{"lineNumber":34958,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すごい速度です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At incredible speed!\""},{"lineNumber":34959,"originalJapaneseLine":"「逃げて下さい、ランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Run away, Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":34960,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とても勝ち目はありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You don’t stand a chance.\""},{"lineNumber":34961,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……けっ。手間が省けたではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph. That saves me some trouble.\""},{"lineNumber":34962,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元々、奴を探しにここまで来たんだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I originally came all this way to find that guy.\""},{"lineNumber":34963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ、探しに来たのは魔人ケイブリスです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it was the demon Kaiburis who came looking.\""},{"lineNumber":34964,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王ケイブリスは……戦える相手ではありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Demon King Kaiburis... is not someone we can fight.\""},{"lineNumber":34965,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やってみなくちゃ分かるまい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You won't know unless you try.\""},{"lineNumber":34966,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに、美樹ちゃんの仇だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides, it’s for Miki-chan’s revenge.\""},{"lineNumber":34967,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勿体ない事をしやがって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’ve done something unforgivable.\""},{"lineNumber":34968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is...\""},{"lineNumber":34969,"originalJapaneseLine":"「セ、センサーに反応……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Se-sensors are detecting a response...\""},{"lineNumber":34970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人……いえ、魔王ケイブリス！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demon... no, Demon King Kaiburis!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦意喪失……でしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Have they lost the will to fight...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう……それにしては、潮が引くようじゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph... yet it’s like the tide is receding."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命令を受けた者の動きに見えるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It looks like the movement of those who received an order..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先発隊に、周囲の把握を……」
「何か、向こうにいます！」
「大きい……デカントか何か……？」
「魔王様のおなりだ、カスカスカスども！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon King himself has arrived, you worthless scum!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 精々楽しませやがれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Make sure you enjoy yourselves while you can!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――――虐殺が、始まった。
「北方方面軍、壊滅……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Northern Front Army... has been annihilated!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、どうした！」
「は、それが……魔物一匹に、
北方面軍が壊滅状態に陥っているとのことで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "the Northern Front Army has fallen into a state of collapse..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁ！？　一匹にか！？」
「しょ、正体不明の、巨大な魔物が……！
あ、いえ、自らを魔王と名乗って……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, it calls itself the Demon King...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、しゃきっと喋りやがれ！
何が出たんだ！」
「ケイブリス……ケイブリスです！
ケイブリスが現れて、北方面軍は……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kaiburis appeared, and the Northern Front Army...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと、自分で出てきやがったのか！」
「でもランス様、すごーく強いという話ですけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, Lord Rance, I’ve heard it’s incredibly strong,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくらなんでも、こんな……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "surely it can’t be like this... right...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、無敵結界があるからだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. It must be because of the invincible barrier."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の居ない間に……」
「いいえ、ランス。
どうやら、我々は遅すぎたようです」
「クルックー？　どうした」
「つい、先程……年号が変わりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just a little while ago... the era changed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はKL元年に。つまり……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is now the first year of KL. That means..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王が……代替わりした…………」
「はい。ケイブリスは、魔王になったようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Kaiburis has apparently become the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ……美樹ちゃんは…………」
「魔人……いえ、魔王ケイブリス、こちらに来ます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon... no, Demon King Kaiburis is coming here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい速度です！」
「逃げて下さい、ランス。
とても勝ち目はありません」
「……けっ。手間が省けたではないか。
元々、奴を探しにここまで来たんだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I originally came all this way to find that guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ、探しに来たのは魔人ケイブリスです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it was the demon Kaiburis who came looking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ケイブリスは……戦える相手ではありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon King Kaiburis... is not someone we can fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やってみなくちゃ分かるまい。
それに、美樹ちゃんの仇だ。
勿体ない事をしやがって」
「セ、センサーに反応……
魔人……いえ、魔王ケイブリス！

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
